attributes.action: Amend the rule to close tennis courts and golf courses throughout lockdown 3
attributes.additional_details: 2 people can meet to walk but cannot meet to walk and periodically hit a golf ball...
attributes.background: Change the rule to allow people to play tennis and golf, which is [naturally] socially distanced and helps to maintain health both physical and mental

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557167
